H0.text: Produce pollution is why fossil fuels are considered nonrenewable.

H1.text: They are no longer used by humans, which is why fossil fuels are considered nonrenewable.

H2.text: Fossil fuels are considered nonrenewable because they often contain microscopic animals.

H3.text: Take millions of years to form is why fossil fuels are considered nonrenewable.

A4.text: They are classified as non-renewable resources because they take millions of years to form.

A5.text: Due to the length of time it takes for them to form, fossil fuels are considered non-renewable resources.
